articles.author: Chicago Tribune
articles.title: Mattel plans to raise prices on some toys to offset tariff costs
articles.description: Mattel Inc., the maker of Barbie dolls, Hot Wheels cars and other popular toys, said Monday that it would have to raise prices for some products sold in the U.S. “where necessary” to offset higher costs related to President Donald Trump’s tariffs.

articles.author: The Mercury News
articles.title: New York Times wins 4 Pulitzers, New Yorker 3; Washington Post wins for coverage of Trump shooting
articles.description: The New York Times won four Pulitzer Prizes and the New Yorker three on Monday for journalism in 2024 that touched on topics like the fentanyl crisis, the U.S. military and last summer’s assassination attempt on President Donald Trump. The Pulitzers’ prestigious public service medal went to ProPublica […]

articles.author: Chicago Tribune
articles.title: Toss suit restricting access to abortion medication
articles.description: The Trump administration on Monday asked a judge to toss out a lawsuit from three GOP-led states seeking to cut off telehealth access to abortion medication mifepristone.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON — The Trump administration on Monday asked a judge to toss out a lawsuit from three GOP-led states seeking to cut off telehealth access to abortion medication mifepristone.

articles.title: Trump administration says Harvard will receive no new grants until it meets White House demands
articles.description: Government official says Harvard has failed in areas of antisemitism, racial discrimination, abandonment of rigour and viewpoint diversity
articles.content:
Harvard University will receive no new federal grants until it meets a series of demands from President Donald Trump’s administration, the Education Department announced Monday.
